verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Sophar \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Naamathite|strong="H5284"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* various thoughts succeed \w one|strong="H3651"\w* another \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* mind \w is|strong="H3651"\w* hurried \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* different things.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* pride \w mount|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w even|strong="H0518"\w* \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H5869"\w* \w seen|strong="H5869"\w* him, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H5869"\w* him \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w behold|strong="H7789"\w* him.

\w His|strong="H7725"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* oppressed \w with|strong="H3027"\w* want, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* sorrow.

\w For|strong="H8478"\w* \w when|strong="H0518"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* be \w sweet|strong="H4985"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w His|strong="H7130"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* belly shall \w be|strong="H3899"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w the|strong="H2015"\w* gall \w of|strong="H3899"\w* asps \w within|strong="H7130"\w* him.

\w The|strong="H3423"\w* \w riches|strong="H2428"\w* which \w he|strong="H0990"\w* hath \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w*; \w he|strong="H0990"\w* shall \w vomit|strong="H6958"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*, \w and|strong="H2428"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* shall draw \w them|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w his|strong="H3423"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*.

He \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w suck|strong="H3243"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* head \w of|strong="H3956"\w* asps, \w and|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* \w viper’s|strong="H0660"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H2026"\w*.

(\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w streams|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H5104"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* brooks \w of|strong="H5104"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H5104"\w* \w butter|strong="H2529"\w*.)

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* punished \w for|strong="H2428"\w* all \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* consumed: according \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* devices \w so|strong="H3808"\w* also \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* suffer.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w broke|strong="H7533"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* stripped \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath violently \w taken|strong="H1497"\w* \w away|strong="H1497"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* filled: \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w things|strong="H2530"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w coveted|strong="H2530"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* able \w to|strong="H4422"\w* possess \w them|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H8300"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* meat, \w and|strong="H3651"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w continue|strong="H3651"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* goods:

\w When|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w*, \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* straitened, \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* burn, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* sorrow \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w fall|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* indignation \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* \w down|strong="H4305"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* war \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

He shall \w flee|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H1272"\w* \w weapons|strong="H5402"\w* \w of|strong="H7198"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w and|strong="H7198"\w* shall fall upon a \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H7198"\w* brass.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* sword is \w drawn|strong="H8025"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* scabbard, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* glittereth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* bitterness: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w terrible|strong="H0367"\w* ones shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w secret|strong="H6845"\w* \w places|strong="H3605"\w*: \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* kindled \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* afflicted when \w left|strong="H8300"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.
